settings.Name: chatEnabled
settings.Notes: When disabled, bubbleChatEnabled is automatically turned off as well.

settings.Name: bubbleChatEnabled
settings.Description: Whether or not bubble chat is enabled

settings.Name: chatAnchoredPosition
settings.Notes: Use 1 for top anchoring, 0 for bottom anchoring.

settings.Name: chatHorizontalSize
settings.Description: How big the chat is, horizontally
settings.Notes: Values outside the range of 0.1 to 1.0 may lead to unpredictable behavior; it is advisable to adhere to these limits.

settings.Name: chatMessageDisplayCount
settings.Description: How many messages the chat displays
settings.Notes: Will probably be replaced with chatDisplayLineCount.

settings.Name: chatMessageDestroyDelay
settings.Description: How long until a message gets destroyed, in seconds
